title: Kayle strength!?!?!?!?!?!??!?!?!

{{champion:10}} 

Get there please! 


Statik shiv and nashors tooth and she literally hits Q and two AAs and dead from full HP? The only person who has more burst than that is fizz with a full build and thats pushing it. 

Edit: Teach you to take out my extra spaces!!!!!!

replies.body: I haven't seen a single Kayle for more than 10 games now, so there isn't much to complain about her.
they gutted her ap ratio and made her ult longer, when will it be enough...

> they gutted her ap ratio and made her ult longer, when will it be enough...

if they gutter her ap RATIO then how can she two shot anything with Q and AA having just static shiv and nashors tooth? JS.

and even if you do fight her she will just use her ult which is now what 25 secs long? cause i mean crap. whole lux rotation including ult negated.

> if they gutter her ap RATIO then how can she two shot **anything** with Q and AA having just static shiv and nashors tooth? JS

Definetily not Baron, Dragon, Mundo, Blue, Red, Nautalis, Thresh, Leona, Vladamir, Swain, Ryze, Singed, Maoki, Alistar, Cho'gath, Zac, Darius, Jarvan, Warwick, Vi, Yorick, Urgot, Nasus, Sion, or Renekton.  I have probably missed a lot more.

As an older champion, Kayle sufferes from an identity issue. Is she a Mid Laner? Support? She looks like a support with her heal and ult, but the rest of her feels like mid lane. She has a similar issue to Lulu. Remember, there is a reason people aren't playing Kayle much competitively anymore.
